pages.text: $(li)When a tamed $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/cat)Cat$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/horse)Horse$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/revamped_wolf/wolf)Wolf$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:pets/quark/foxhound)Fouxhound$(/l) dies, you will a time to save it.$(br)$(li)Just right click your diying pet while you are holding this item in your hand to revive it with half of one heart of life.
